tabs.title: Line Charts
tabs.text:
// Full statement, overview
Stock
| where Symbol in ('AAPL', 'MSFT', 'ORCL', 'NVDA', 'ABBN.SW', 'GOOG')
| where valueTimestamp  > datetime(1996-01-01)
| summarize max(close) by Symbol, bin(valueTimestamp, 30d)
| render linechart with(xcolumn=valueTimestamp, series=Symbol)

// Step by step
Gold_Stock
| where valueTimestamp between (datetime(2020-01-01) .. datetime(2021-05-01)) and Symbol in('AAPL', 'GOOG', 'MSFT')
| project Symbol, valueTimestamp, close
| evaluate pivot(Symbol, any(close))
| render timechart with(ysplit=panels)
tabs.commandInContext:
// Step by step
Gold_Stock
| where valueTimestamp between (datetime(2020-01-01) .. datetime(2021-05-01)) and Symbol in('AAPL', 'GOOG', 'MSFT')
| project Symbol, valueTimestamp, close
| evaluate pivot(Symbol, any(close))
| render timechart with(ysplit=panels)
tabs.commandWithoutLeadingComments:
// Step by step
Gold_Stock
| where valueTimestamp between (datetime(2020-01-01) .. datetime(2021-05-01)) and Symbol in('AAPL', 'GOOG', 'MSFT')
| project Symbol, valueTimestamp, close
| evaluate pivot(Symbol, any(close))
| render timechart with(ysplit=panels)

tabs.title: Power BI interface
Outliers
tabs.text:
range x from 1 to 100 step 1 
| extend y=iff(x==20 or x==80, 10*rand()+10+(50-x)/2, 10*rand()+10) // series with outliers at x=20 and x=80
| summarize x=make_list(x),series=make_list(y)
| extend series_stats(series), outliers=series_outliers(series)
| mv-expand x to typeof(long), series to typeof(double), outliers to typeof(double)
| project x, series , outliers_removed=iff(outliers > 1.5 or outliers < -1.5, series_stats_series_avg , series ) 
| render linechart
